Commands.Proper Shot: Wind ranged BRV attack  High turn rate  Guaranteed hit
Commands.Arrow Rain: Group ranged BRV attack + HP attack  Deals proportionate HP damage to each target  Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt  Recovery limit: 5% of individual MAX HP
Commands.Explosive Bow: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Deals 50% HP damage to other enemies.  Inflicts Explosion for 5 turns.  Explosion steals a certain amount of BRV at the end of the turn.

Artifacts.HP Damage Guard: Raises Defense Power by 20% after taking HP damage
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Proper Shot: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Proper Shot by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Arrow Rain: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Arrow Rain by 10%

Passives.Proper Shot Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Proper Shot.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Attack Proficiency: Slightly raises Attack up to 10 times after every BRV attack.
Passives.Arrow Rain Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Arrow Rain.
Passives.Proper Shot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Proper Shot.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Arrow Rain Charge: Increases the max uses of Arrow Rain by 1.
Passives.Rebel Army: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.The BRV value granted is limited to 150% of Initial BRV.

Weapons.Mythril Bow CP: 15: Increases the potency of Proper Shot and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and BRV Regen for 3 turns.
Weapons.Yoichi's Bow CP: 35: Increases the potency of Arrow Rain, raises its HP recovery limit and lowers its Action Delay.Raises inflicted BRV damage when there is only one target.Grants Small Attack Up for 3 turns to all party members.
